column5: Hi all,  I'm going through my videos at the moment (all 542 of them) sorting them out etc...etc... and its just amazing watching some of the ones where Jack was younger. Was watching this one this evening and my heart nearly exploded out of my chest...I LOVE HIM SO MUCH! He is just an awesomely kind, polite, considerate and compasionate little dood who is smart as hell! VERY PROUD OF HIM.  Had to share this one again from 2012....the conversations we had in the boat were great...cant wait to get out in the boat again.
Cute kid. Luv your video's....I bought a camcorder way back, almost broke the bank. I think we have 1 short DVD of the girls here now. What a waste, wish I hadda done more with it
That boy of yours is something precious, for certain.  I hope to have the privilege of meeting you both before Jack grows up too much.
a teenager monster ...............that just made my day lmao
Priceless memories there Simon, though you have a ton of them with your family.  And very well documented with pics and video.
Nice video! My little guy just turned 1 a few days ago....I am really looking forward to fishing with him too.
great stuff Simon.   that one made me smile too .
Hahaha frig Jack is awesome?  Nice vid Simon, as always

I'll agree..... Nice little video. I took my little guy fishing on the ice, for his first time. It was short lived as expected. Patience levels aren't too high at that age, but it was a memorable time, nonetheless.
